## Rexpense API Docs

The API docs are served by [Jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com/) (static site generator) via [GitHub Pages](https://help.github.com/articles/using-jekyll-with-pages).

To setup the project in development:

```
$ bundle install
```

To run the project in development:

```
$ bin/foreman start -f Procfile.development
```
